name: Therify
headline: Inclusive mental healthcare for companies
description: Therify is an inclusive mental health benefit for companies. Through our web platform, employees access culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided content to support their emotional well-being.

founders.name: James Murray, Founder
founders.description: James is co-founder and CEO of Therify. He previously led partnerships with digital news organizations at Facebook and Instagram. Prior to Facebook, he worked on the enterprise sales team at InVision, a venture-backed product design platform.

founders.name: Warren Sadler, Founder
founders.description:
My background is unique as a technical founder as I started my career as a musician and designer. I've worked for large healthcare companies like HCA, consumer companies like Asurion, and working as a consultant with McKinsey. 

My passion is helping individuals find the therapy they need. Having seen what meaningful conversation, self exploration, and self improvement can do to transform lives firsthand, I am deeply committed to make a more resilient, thoughtful, and connected world.

Resources
[ArticlesInsights for creating and sustaining a culture of well-being.](https://www.therify.co/</resources/articles>)[WebinarsOn-demand webinars for creating and sustaining a culture of well-being.](https://www.therify.co/</resources/webinars/allwebinars>)
[Login](https://www.therify.co/<https:/matching.therify.co>)[Schedule a demo](https://www.therify.co/<https:/calendly.com/warren-therify/therify-discovery-call>)
# **Mental healthcare made human**
We make it easy for employees and their families to access in-network care for every step of their journey.
[Schedule a demo](https://www.therify.co/<https:/calendly.com/warren-therify/therify-discovery-call>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/63093eb3c8ed3babbb122d38_providers.png)
**Our Innovative Partners**
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64da2d2e966d7561712028b6_Indeed.svg)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64dd473fc429468507854aec_Thumbtack.svg)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64da2d2ee627fe010d62209d_Dataminr.svg)
![Company logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64da2d2e27348451f1575c84_Critical%20Mass.svg)
## **In-network mental healthcare that works for everyone**
Therify is a personalized, in-network mental health platform. Unlike EAPs, we make it easy for employees to access high-quality, in-network mental health providers, increasing access to care and reducing costs.
[See how it works](https://www.therify.co/</platform/in-network-mental-health-platform>)
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/66b65831aa4332c71593ce83_Well%20Being.webp)
### Increase Access
Custom Provider Network
Design a custom network ofin-network therapists, tailored to your employees and their families.
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/66b65d343e639f281cb347b6_Redeuce%20Costs.webp)
### **Reduce Costs**
Digital Care Navigation
Offer access to dedicated Care Navigators who match employees to licensed therapists in your network.
![Mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/66b65833223db634cb1db2b6_Team%20Coaching.webp)
### **Drive Satisfaction**
Provider Vetting
Provide access to the best mental health providers in your network, hand-selected and vetted by Therify.
## **Prioritize well-being & watch your people (and your business) thrive**
92%
of employees report improved mental health outcomes after using Therify
$1,260
$1,260 of cost savings per employee utilizing Therify
4x
4x higher engagement than employee assistance programs (EAPs)
### “Therify matched me with the perfect therapist even though I didn’t have the words at the time to describe who I was looking for. The match feature is a game changer.”
![Testimonial logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64da2d2e966d7561712028b6_Indeed.svg)
Becca
UX Design Manager, Indeed
### “The wellbeing of our global team is always a priority, and Therify makes it easy to deliver the care and support we strive to provide. Working with Therify feels like a true partnership.”
![Testimonial logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64da2d2e27348451f1575c84_Critical%20Mass.svg)
Taylor Cook
Director of DEI, Critical Mass
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/66b805cf42a15fc71d0ae281_Icon%20Button%205.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/66b805cf6c669c1df9716b32_Icon%20Button%204.svg)
## Build a resilient workforce
Increasing access to high-quality mental healthcare while containing costs can be challenging, but Therify makes it possible.
![Person use therify on their smart phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64e4045559df87be19547ca1_Website-Assets-2023-min.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64e10920a682fc87d4015cef_Check%20Mark.svg)
Design a Custom Solution
Collaborate with a Therify to evaluate your organization's wellbeing needs and design a clinically-backed solution, tailored to your employees.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64e10920a682fc87d4015cef_Check%20Mark.svg)
Implement and Monitor
Easily implement Therify across your organization, track progress, and monitor engagement and outcomes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63036fae7a2d87adca378a78/64e10920a682fc87d4015cef_Check%20Mark.svg)
Report and Optimize
Partner with a Therify wellbeing expert to analyze reporting and demonstrate the business value of the program.
## **See what our members are saying**
“Therify matched me with the perfect therapist even though I didn’t have the words at the time to describe who I was looking for. The match feature is a game changer.”
Becca
UX Design Manager, Indeed
“Part of the anxiety of starting mental health care pertains to the hurdle of getting the initial meeting with a new therapist set up. Therify made the process effortless from my end and I truly appreciate it.”
Anonymous Member
Flexport
“My Therify provider is great. Very happy to work with her! The program far exceeds my original expectations.”
Anonymous Member
Indeed
## Resources
The latest insights from Therify
[See All](https://www.therify.co/</resources/articles>)

## [Disability Pride MonthNot all companies know how to celebrate people with disabilities, though, or how to include those with invisible illnesses or disabilities. ](https://www.therify.co/</articles/disability-pride-month>)

## [From Passion to Profession: Indeed's Sarah Sloan on Leading Wellbeing in the WorkplaceWe sat down with Sarah Sloan, Global Wellbeing Team Lead at Indeed, to discuss her 20-year career and the future of workplace wellbeing.](https://www.therify.co/</articles/from-passion-to-profession-indeeds-sarah-sloan-on-leading-wellbeing-in-the-workplace>)
## [Mental Health in Sales: A Conversation with Brooke Adair of IroncladWe sat down with tech sales veteran Brooke Adair to explore how mental health influences success in sales. ](https://www.therify.co/</articles/mental-health-in-sales-a-conversation-with-brooke-adair-of-ironclad>)

## [Minority Mental Health MonthIn 2008, the House of Representatives declared July as Bebe Moore Campbell National Minority Mental Health Awareness Month, also commonly referred to as Minority Mental Health Awareness Month.](https://www.therify.co/</articles/minority-mental-health-month>)
## FAQs
Here are answers to some common questions about Therify.
[Schedule a demo](https://www.therify.co/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/jem9/sales-meetings>)
**What is Therify?**
Therify is an in-network mental health platform that makes it easy for employees and their families to access licensed therapists, coaches, and wellness and DEIB programming. We help leading employees such as Indeed, Omnicom Media, and Thumbtack maximize employee well-being and reduce costs.
**What outcomes can my organization expect from using Therify?**
Employees who use Therify access care faster – typically within 48 hours – resulting in better mental health outcomes and increased wellbeing.In addition, 90% of employees who use Therify feel more positive about their workplace, leading to improved satisfaction and lower employee turnover.For self-insured employers, Therify's in-network platform decreases out-of-network utilization and generates ~$1,260 of cost savings per employee who uses Therify, allowing you to simultaneously invest in employee wellbeing and contain costs.As a result, Therify customers build a strong, adaptable company culture that can handle any challenge.
## **Take control of workplace wellness**
Get a custom plan, tailored to your company, for implementing an effective wellbeing initiaitives that increase employee wellbeing, drive engagement, and reduce costs.

generated_description:
Therify is a New York-based company that aims to revolutionize workplace mental healthcare by providing inclusive support tailored for employees and their families. Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch S21, Therify offers a web platform that connects users to culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided resources to foster emotional well-being.

The core mission of Therify is straightforward: ensure that mental health care is accessible and effective for everyone in the workplace. Unlike traditional Employee Assistance Programs (EAPs), Therify’s model allows companies to create a customized network of in-network therapists, enhancing not only the accessibility of care but also optimizing costs. 

With just a small team of three, Therify is making significant waves in the mental health tech sector. Their approach boasts impressive statistics: 92% of users report improved mental health outcomes, and the average cost saving per employee using Therify amounts to $1,260. They’ve also garnered partnerships with notable brands like Indeed and Thumbtack, further validating their service's efficacy.

The platform facilitates a seamless experience for employees, connecting them to licensed therapists often within 48 hours, assisting with personalized care navigation, and prioritizing satisfaction through a rigorous vetting process for providers. Their commitment does not stop there—they also provide educational resources through articles and webinars that help cultivate a culture of well-being within organizations.

If you’re exploring ways to enhance employee wellness while managing costs, Therify presents a compelling case. Their focus on personalized, in-network care could very well be the catalyst for a healthier, happier workplace. Interested parties can learn more and schedule demos through their [website](https://www.therify.co/) to see how they can bring Therify's innovative solutions to their organizations.
